name: Blue Butterfly Herbal Tea Blend
description: Refreshing, fruity and unique. Add a squeeze of lemon juice and watch the gorgeous colour transform from indigo blue to fuschia pink.
preparation: Pour 1 cup boiling water over 1 tea bag. Steep 5-7 min. Chill for a refreshing, caffeine-free iced herbal tea.

products.name: Blue Butterfly Herbal Tea Blend (staples)
summary: A refreshing sipper that's mildly sweet with hint of grape and vibrant pea flowers.
